game.name: Outpost Market Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Outpost Market Simulator는 1-6인용 협동 게임입니다. 시장을 건설하고, 전리품을 주문하고, 아이템을 제작 및 판매하며, 새로운 기술을 연구하고, 방어 시설을 구축하여 매일 밤 좀비의 공격에서 살아남으세요
game.shortDescriptionEn: Outpost Market Simulator is a 1–6 player co-op game. Build your market, order loot, craft items, sell them, research new tech, and build defenses to survive the nightly zombie attacks
